import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function () { const [myStyle, setMyStyle] = useState({ color: "white", backgroundColor: "Black", }); const [btnText, setBtnText] = useState("Enable Dark Mode"); toggleStyle = () => { if (myStyle.color == "White") { setMyStyle({ color: "Black", backgroundColor: "white", }); setBtnText("Enable Light Mode"); } else { setMyStyle({ color: "white", backgroundColor: "Black", }); setBtnText("Enable Dark Mode"); } }; return (
